title: Emigre #16: Collector's Copies Sale
content:
ANNOUNCING:   
   
Emigre #16: Collector's Copies Sale   
+ Rare Emigre Poster Sale   
   
   
--------------------------------------------------------------   
Emigre #16   
To celebrate the upcoming release of Bruce Licher's new Scenic   
CD (see Emigre #63), we are offering for sale 20 copies of   
Emigre #16, which sold out years ago.   
Published in 1990, the cover of this issue was designed and   
printed by Bruce Licher at Independent Project Press in   
Los Angeles. 3,000 covers were printed on a hand-fed Vandercook   
219 letterpress on plain chipboard. Since the printing took a   
gruesome four days, a different color was used each day in order   
to break the monotony of hand-fed printing. Therefore there are   
four different colored covers; copper, dark red, black, and brown.   
We have unearthed 20 copies of the copper colored covers, and are   
offering them for sale on a first come first serve basis.   
Emigre #16 featured the inauguration of Emigre Music. It includes   
interviews with Bruce Licher, Fact TwentyTwo, Every Good Boy   
and others. It also includes a large pull out poster announcing   
the birth of Emigre Music.   
Emigre #16 was published in the original size of 11 x 17 inches.   
Price: $25.00   
   
See the cover image at:   
 [http://www.emigre.com/EMag.php?issue=16](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020142312/http:/www.emigre.com/EMag.php?issue=16)   
   
   
--------------------------------------------------------------   
Press Time! 2 Poster Set   
   
Limited edition 2-poster set. These two posters were originally   
printed as part of Emigre #12 (published in 1989), and were   
designed to function as signatures for Emigre magazine and   
as posters when unbound.   
Printed in two colors on heavy stock, 25" x 38".   
(This set is part of the permanent design collection of the   
San Francisco Museum of Modern Art.)   
Price: $25.00 (FedEx Shipping only)   
   
See the cover image at:   
 [http://www.emigre.com/EPosters.php?set=POEMPRSSTME](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020142312/http:/www.emigre.com/EPosters.php?set=POEMPRSSTME)   
   
To avoid receiving damaged posters, express shipping is required.   
(3 item shipping) Express shipping for this item is: US $21 /   
Canada $27 / S.America $48 / Western Europe, Asia, Australia and   
Middle East $33 / Elsewhere $60
author: Joe Pemberton
